select 
   top 100 *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )as [result]

-- use storedProcedure
exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'select
   top 100 *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk ''https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        format=''csv'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION=''2.0''
    )as [result]'

-- use max length of columns
select 
     max(len(locationId))as len_locationid,
     max(len(Borough))as Borough,
     max(len(Zone))as Zone,
     max(len(service_zone))as service_zone
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )as [result]


--use with clause to provide explicit data types

select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]

exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'select
*
from
    openrowset(
        bulk ''https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        format=''csv'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR='','',
        ROWTERMINATOR=''\n'',
        PARSER_VERSION=''2.0''
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]'

    select name,collation_name from sys.databases

-- Specify UTF-8 collation for varchar dataTypes

select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15) collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_Sc_UTF8,
        Zone varchar(50) collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_Sc_UTF8,
        service_zone varchar(15)collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_Sc_UTF8
    )
    as [result]


create database nyc_taxi_discovery

use nyc_taxi_discovery

alter database nyc_taxi_discovery collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_Sc_UTF8

     *

select * from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        header_row=True,

    )
    with(
        locationID smallint 1,
        borough varchar(15) 2,
        zone varchar(50) 3,
        service_zone varchar(15) 4
